title: Almost 4000mb update?
body: Is something wrong with py pc? Whats up with the recent update and its so big ?

replies.body: This can happen sometimes on patch day, and is usually just a visual error that happens when the patcher prepares your game files.  When reading them, it can erroneously show up as part of the update size.

Same thing happened to me. Game shutdown suddenly while i was playing. Then when i logged on again, it showed the Term of User Agreement and a 4000mb (4Gb) downloading and I was even marked as AFK. =/
Happened just now.

No, dont worry it displays 4gb for me too, but its actually way less cause 4gb takes 12 hours to download with my internet but the update actually took 1 hour only so probably its a display glitch or something
